body:
School conjuration (healing)

Level alchemist 2, bard 2, cleric 2, druid 3, inquisitor 2, paladin 3, ranger 3, witch 2

Duration instantaneous

Saving Throw Will half (harmless) or Will half

Spell Resistance yes (harmless)

Target Restrictions personal, selected

The target of a wordspell with this effect word is cured of 2d6 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +10). Undead are damaged by this effect word, but can attempt a Will save for half damage and spell resistance as normal.
name: Moderate Cure
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Healing Words/Moderate Cure

sections.body: The target is cured of 2d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +10).
sections.name: Boost
